name: We Are Monkeys
description:
Game made for the first #GranadaJam Game Jam 2016 in 48 hours.

GranadaJam Page: Granada Jam

Mankind has evolved monkeys, different primate species inhabit the earth. To be the dominant species you must catch the rest.

DEVELOPMENT TEAM

  • Level and Game Design: Alfonso Jurado
  • Programming: Clemente Solana
  • 2D Art: Lorena Ruiz, María Sánchez
  • Music and audio: Rafael Lara

Known Issues:

F11 -> FULL SCREEN
